tool_description: A robust lead verification solution that offers advanced validation capabilities for lead data submitted through a RESTful API. The service employs state-of-the-art algorithms to verify the accuracy and validity of critical lead information such as name, email address, phone number, and other relevant data points. It utilizes a range of data sources to check whether the submitted data is accurate, up-to-date, and consistent with known records.
name: Lead Identity Check
title: Lead Identity Check

api_list.name: Phone & Email Lookup
api_list.description: Allows users to perform phone and email lookup using a given set of parameters such as first name, last name, phone number and email address. Returns a value from 0-100 that indicates the likelihood a phone number or email address matches the name provided. Also, returns whether or not the phone is active and has recently seen activity. We recommend a valid lead to have a Phone Score > 67 & a Phone Active of Yes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lead-identity-check1.p.rapidapi.com/phone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lead-identity-check1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lead-identity-check1.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Age Calculator
api_list.description: Calculates the age of a person based on the provided date of birth. It provides both a whole and 2 digit decimal age in the response. The whole age is calculated based on the year and month difference between the current date and the provided date of birth. The decimal age is calculated based on the difference between the current date and the provided date of birth in years and then rounded off to 2 decimal places.

api_list.name: City and State Lookup
api_list.description: Provides a city and state lookup based on a US Zip Code provided in the request body.
